In the last few decades game-tape has helped athletes, tools like Google Analytics and Mixpanel have revolutionized marketing by letting marketers understand their funnels, and tools like New Relic have helped engineers understand their systems – but Human operations teams doing customer service, sales, content review, and more have been largely left out of the revolution.
